languages.text: {n}Гемункул надолго задумывается.{/n} "Исчерпавшая запас прочности, отпущенный ее телу, мужская особь мон-кай? Я держал его в загоне, но он так назойливо пытался сбежать и направиться на твои поиски, что я его вышвырнул. Слуги шептались, что подсказали ему направиться на поиски в Увечный сектор. Довольно жестокая шутка, мне по нраву".

{n}The Haemonculus thinks for a moment.{/n} "The mon-keigh male who exhausted his body beyond recovery? I kept him in the pen, but his attempts to escape to search for you grew so irritating that I cast him out. I overheard the servants whispering that they told him to check the Mangled Sector. Quite the devious trick. I approve."
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункул надолго задумывается.{/n} "Исчерпавшая запас прочности, отпущенный ее телу, мужская особь мон-кай? Я держал его в загоне, но он так назойливо пытался сбежать и направиться на твои поиски, что я его вышвырнул. Слуги шептались, что подсказали ему направиться на поиски в Увечный сектор. Довольно жестокая шутка, мне по нраву".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus thinks for a long while.{/n} "The mon-keigh male who had exhausted his body's durability limit? I kept him in the pen, but he was so irritating in his attempts to escape and go looking for you that I threw him out. I overheard the servants whispering about having advised him to go check the Mangled Sector. A rather devious trick. I found it amusing."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}L'hémoncule réfléchit un instant.{/n} « Le mon-keigh qui a épuisé son corps au-delà de toute possibilité de récupération ? Je l'avais mis dans l'enclos, mais ses tentatives d'évasion constantes pour vous rejoindre étaient insupportables. Je l'ai mis dehors. J'ai entendu des serviteurs lui conseiller de partir à votre recherche dans le Secteur condamné. C'était vraiment perfide. Je suis content d'eux. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus thinks for a moment.{/n} "The mon-keigh male who exhausted his body beyond recovery? I kept him in the pen, but his attempts to escape to search for you grew so irritating that I cast him out. I overheard the servants whispering that they told him to check the Mangled Sector. Quite the devious trick. I approve."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'hémoncule réfléchit un instant.{/n} « Le mon-keigh qui a épuisé son corps au-delà de toute possibilité de récupération ? Je l'avais mis dans l'enclos, mais ses tentatives d'évasion constantes pour vous rejoindre étaient insupportables. Je l'ai mis dehors. J'ai entendu des serviteurs lui conseiller de partir à votre recherche dans le Secteur condamné. C'était vraiment perfide. Je suis content d'eux. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}血伶人思考了片刻。{/n}“就是那只公猴子吧？他把自己的身体折腾得根本无法复原。我之前把他关在了围栏里，但他打算逃出去找你。我非常恼火，于是把他赶了出去。我无意中听到我的仆人们窃窃私语，他们说让那个人去崩落区看看。这可真是个恶毒的小把戏，我很喜欢。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus thinks for a moment.{/n} "The mon-keigh male who exhausted his body beyond recovery? I kept him in the pen, but his attempts to escape to search for you grew so irritating that I cast him out. I overheard the servants whispering that they told him to check the Mangled Sector. Quite the devious trick. I approve."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人思考了片刻。{/n}“就是那只公猴子吧？他把自己的身体折腾得根本无法复原。我之前把他关在了围栏里，但他打算逃出去找你。我非常恼火，于是把他赶了出去。我无意中听到我的仆人们窃窃私语，他们说让那个人去崩落区看看。这可真是个恶毒的小把戏，我很喜欢。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Der Haemonculus denkt einen Augenblick lang nach.{/n} "Der männliche Chem-Pan-Sey, der seinen Körper hoffnungslos erschöpft hat? Ich habe ihn im Pferch gehalten. Doch seine Versuche, zu fliehen um Euch zu suchen, wurden mit der Zeit etwas nervtötend. Ich habe ihn hinausgeworfen. Ich habe die Diener flüstern hören, dass sie ihm gesagt haben, er solle es im Zerfleischten Sektor versuchen. Eine gerissene List. Ich heiße das gut."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus thinks for a moment.{/n} "The mon-keigh male who exhausted his body beyond recovery? I kept him in the pen, but his attempts to escape to search for you grew so irritating that I cast him out. I overheard the servants whispering that they told him to check the Mangled Sector. Quite the devious trick. I approve."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Haemonculus denkt einen Augenblick lang nach.{/n} "Der männliche Chem-Pan-Sey, der seinen Körper hoffnungslos erschöpft hat? Ich habe ihn im Pferch gehalten. Doch seine Versuche, zu fliehen um Euch zu suchen, wurden mit der Zeit etwas nervtötend. Ich habe ihn hinausgeworfen. Ich habe die Diener flüstern hören, dass sie ihm gesagt haben, er solle es im Zerfleischten Sektor versuchen. Eine gerissene List. Ich heiße das gut."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}El Hemónculo cavila un momento.{/n} «¿El mon-keigh macho que ha agotado su cuerpo al punto de ya no poder recuperarse? Lo metí en el corral, pero ya no soportaba que intentara huir en tu búsqueda una vez más, así que lo eché. He oído a los sirvientes susurrar que le han dicho que vaya al Sector Destrozado. Un truco bastante astuto. Me gusta».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus thinks for a moment.{/n} "The mon-keigh male who exhausted his body beyond recovery? I kept him in the pen, but his attempts to escape to search for you grew so irritating that I cast him out. I overheard the servants whispering that they told him to check the Mangled Sector. Quite the devious trick. I approve."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Hemónculo cavila un momento.{/n} «¿El mon-keigh macho que ha agotado su cuerpo al punto de ya no poder recuperarse? Lo metí en el corral, pero ya no soportaba que intentara huir en tu búsqueda una vez más, así que lo eché. He oído a los sirvientes susurrar que le han dicho que vaya al Sector Destrozado. Un truco bastante astuto. Me gusta».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスは、しばらく考えこむ。{/n}「回復不能なほど体を使い果たしたモン＝ケイの男だと？檻の中に入れておいたが、お前を捜すために逃げようとするのがシャクに障ったから追い出した。従者たちの噂を耳にしたよ。彼に切り裂かれた星域を調べるよう教えたとね。かなり悪質なトリックだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus thinks for a moment.{/n} "The mon-keigh male who exhausted his body beyond recovery? I kept him in the pen, but his attempts to escape to search for you grew so irritating that I cast him out. I overheard the servants whispering that they told him to check the Mangled Sector. Quite the devious trick. I approve."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスは、しばらく考えこむ。{/n}「回復不能なほど体を使い果たしたモン＝ケイの男だと？檻の中に入れておいたが、お前を捜すために逃げようとするのがシャクに障ったから追い出した。従者たちの噂を耳にしたよ。彼に切り裂かれた星域を調べるよう教えたとね。かなり悪質なトリックだ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus bir süre düşünüyor.{/n} "Bedenini toparlayamayacak kadar harap eden erkek mon-keigh mi? Onu hapis tuttum, kaçıp seni arama teşebbüsleri sinirimi bozmaya başlayınca da defettim. Fısıldaşan hizmetkârların ona Biçimsiz Sektör'e bakmasını söylediklerini duydum. Çok sinsi bir numara. Onaylıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus thinks for a moment.{/n} "The mon-keigh male who exhausted his body beyond recovery? I kept him in the pen, but his attempts to escape to search for you grew so irritating that I cast him out. I overheard the servants whispering that they told him to check the Mangled Sector. Quite the devious trick. I approve."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus bir süre düşünüyor.{/n} "Bedenini toparlayamayacak kadar harap eden erken mon-keigh mi? Onu hapis tuttum ancak kaçıp seni arama teşebbüsleri sinirimi bozmaya başlamıştı, ben de onu defettim. Fısıldaşan hizmetkârların ona Biçimsiz Sektör'e bakmasını söylediklerini duydum. Çok sinsi bir numara. Onaylıyorum."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
